```{r, echo = FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
library(huxtable)
```

### `kable` Table

Table \@ref(tab:iris).

```{r iris}
kable(head(iris), caption = "Iris with kable")
```


Table \@ref(tab:huxiris).

```{r huxiris}
hux(head(iris)) %>% set_caption("Iris with huxtable")
```
